info.author: ScaleX Innovation
info.name: scalexi
info.summary: The scalexi package is a versatile open-source Python library that focuses on facilitating low-code development and fine-tuning of diverse Large Language Models (LLMs). It extends beyond its initial OpenAI models integration, offering a scalable framework for various LLMs.
